Logged time to Harvest
@rica (Time: 60mins)

Hi Criselda,

We made some changes to the site. Please see below:

Here is how you can setup a Hotspot Slider:
  1. On this Section Templates. Edit with Elementor "Hotspot – Template". Then copy the "Container" (Please see the attached)
  2. On this Section Templates. Press "ADD NEW TEMPLATE" then name it "Hotspot - {Solution name}" then press Create Template. (Please see the attached)
  3. Then paste the "Container" that has been copied from Step 1 and make changes to the slider then publish.
  4. On this Section Templates. Search for column Shortcode, Copy the shortcode and then paste it on the "Solution post > Slider > Slider Shortcode".

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi Criselda,

We made some changes to the site. Please see below:

Here is how you can setup a Hotspot Slider:
  1. On this Section Templates. Edit with Elementor "Hotspot – Template". Then copy the "Container" (Please see the attached)
  2. On this Section Templates. Press "ADD NEW TEMPLATE" then name it "Hotspot - {Solution name}" then press Create Template. (Please see the attached)
  3. Then paste the "Container" that has been copied from Step 1 and make changes to the slider then publish.
  4. On this Section Templates. Search for column Shortcode, Copy the shortcode and then paste it on the "Solution post > Slider > Slider Shortcode".

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi Chris,

As mentioned in my previous email, we wanted to add clickable icons to an image slider. However, it looks like that our carousel in our product pages is coded (see Full Color Acoustic Wall Panels as an example below).





I made a test page [ https://acoufelt.com.au/?p=32121&preview=true ] to see how this carousel should look like. See screenshot below.

When you click on the [+] sign, the text 'Amethyst' appears.



Can we hide or remove the current image slider then drop this new carousel widget with image hotspots to the product page template?

We can test one page first: Full Colour Acoustic Wall Panels | Acoufelt Australia

Let us know the best way to approach this.
